Articles.Content:
The fastest (there are only 3) and best ship in Zokesia\'s arsenal, The ZNS Ward is an interceptor/destroyer that has 4 laser guns, and can achieve a top speed of 55 meters a second (that\'s 112mph, y\'all).

But the chute deployment system is the best part. She comes down so easily a child could do it.

She has plenty of chutes to gently land in the water, but make sure she doesn\'t go in upside down, or break in half when the chutes open. 

She has for 900 lb thrust props and a suction engine, two thrust engines only come on after you jettison the parachutes and hit space bar again.

Below is a picture and .craft of her. make sure you\'ve got the right mods for her, or she won\'t work.

She is pictured with her bigger (and slower) brother, the Moscow.
